LanguageData.RT_CH54_Vehicle.label: CH54 Tarhe
LanguageData.RT_CH54_Vehicle.description:
A twin-engined heavy-lift helicopter designed for transport, deploy, and evacuate other vehicles.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
